title: Pasta with chicken and portabello mushrooms
ingredients: ['450g pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '160g chopped onion', '60g chopped green pepper', '1 whole boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed', '2 portabello mushrooms, cut into 1.25cm pieces', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon sage, rubbed', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons Chardonnay wine', '125ml Burgundy wine', '900g tomato-based pasta sauce']
